TopicTitle: "Kerbals Have Won" - my tribute song to this fantastic game

Articles.Content:
[![title.jpg](http://whoshotdk.co.uk/KSP/Audio/KerbalsHaveWon/title.jpg)](https://soundcloud.com/whoshotdk/kerbals-have-won)

Listen: https://soundcloud.com/whoshotdk/kerbals-have-won

Added direct download link
Thanks, that's what I was aiming for ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Nice little song! I may be able to find a use for it in a video project in the future. (with proper credit give, of course!)

Thanks! You are most welcome to use the song wherever you like.

You wouldn't happen to be the same Xacktar of the 'Shoop da Whoop' Starmade vid? I just finished watching that to find that you (?) have just replied to this thread. I'm freaked out lol.

> 
> Thanks! You are most welcome to use the song wherever you like.
> You wouldn't happen to be the same Xacktar of the 'Shoop da Whoop' Starmade vid? I just finished watching that to find that you (?) have just replied to this thread. I'm freaked out lol.

That is me!

Wow, that is pretty hilarious! Especially since that is one of my few non-KSP videos. XD
That's a nice tune. I could hear that play when descending to the surface of Eve. Well done!
Fun little tune. You should set up a download so we can use it with [Soundtrack Editor](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65726).

Thanks for the kind words!

I've now included a direct download link to the MP3 in the original post.
I'm starting to feel like my (well, UpsilonAerospace and Endersmens are involved too) parody video will pale in comparison to the originality of these songs I've been finding! Well done!
